name: HTI Technologies
overview: HTI Technologies, Inc. (HTI) started out as Healthcare Technologies, Inc. back in 1989. HTI is a full service provider of software solutions for transcription and workflow management to health care facilities across the United States and Canada. HTI has created a fully integrated suite of products and services, marketed under the MediScribe.NETÂ® brand, that provide enterprise-wide transcription system capabilities, document management and distribution, speech recognition, and dictation support. The company is known for its dedication to maintaining the most robust, technologically advanced and easy to use transcription software and its commitment to personal and timely customer service. HTI is an engineering-based company and has a focus on transcription software that is unmatched in the industry. A privately held company, HTI is based in Atlanta, Georgia, where it has access to some of the country’s best educational and technical institutions. The company maintains relationships with the Georgia Institute of Technology and Southern Polytechnic Institute for software, system, and technical support expertise.

acquisition.source_description: Superior Global Solutions, Inc. Acquires HTI Technologies, Inc.
